entry.data:
CLOUDY WITH A 20 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 50S
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

A CHANCE OF RAIN IN THE MORNING, THEN RAIN IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
EAST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

RAIN
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
RAIN LIKELY IN THE MORNING
HIGHS AROUND 60
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING
LOWS AROUND 40
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
